abilities.name: Fleshcraft
abilities.rule: At the end of your Movement phase, this model can heal one friendly **CRONOS**, **TALOS**, **GROTESQUES** or **WRACKS** unit within 6". If it does, one model in that unit regains up to 3 lost wounds (if you selected a **WRACKS** unit, up to 3 destroyed models are returned to that unit instead).

abilities.name: Horrific Regeneration
abilities.rule: The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.
